Description: This 17-Piece block set comprises of an 8" Chef's Knife, 8" Slicing Knife, 5.5" Santoku Knife, 5.5" Serrated Utility Knife, 3.5" Paring Knife, 2.75" Bird's Beak Paring Knife, 8" Sharpening Steel, All-Purpose Household Shears, 8x - 4.5" Steak Knives, Knife Block.
Name: Cuisinart 17-Piece Artiste Collection Cutlery Knife Block Set, Stainless Steel
